subject: Shipping
description_text:
Hey there simsonn, just wondering when my order SSN2832 is going to be dispatched or sent a tracking number, i ordered it on the 4th of october so its been a fair few days.

Thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi ThatOnlyDev,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959667362
